alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 01 at 4:25AM MST until February 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central New Mexico. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel along snow packed mountain roads will be hazardous. Some roads may be closed. Significant travel delays are possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
